name: Jetpack Boi
description:
The Game

--------------

This game is about flying around and shooting triangles to earn points. Avoid the lava and don run out of fuel while flying to survive.

You can customize you face to um... look different. (or there is a Random button to randomize your appearance)

Help

--------------

W - Jump

A-D - Move

Space - Fly

Click - Shoot
